mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT to_char(daily_log,'mm-dd') AS "targetDate", cnt_user, cnt_post FROM STATISTIC ORDER BY daily_log DESC) WHERE ROWNUM<=7

SELECT extract(month from daily_log) AS "targetDate", SUM(cnt_user) as "cnt_user", sum(cnt_post) as "cnt_post" FROM STATISTIC GROUP BY extract(month from daily_log) ORDER BY extract(month from daily_log)
